
==================
Welcome to MODESpy
==================

.. automodule:: modespy
    :no-members:
    :noindex:
.. This automatically adds the __init__.py docstring as the leading text.

Modules
-------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   MODES - Generic multi-step, multi-order ODE solver (including example code).<modespy.modes>
   Filters - Various standard discrete stepsize controllers.<modespy.filters>
   Methods - Various explicit and implicit methods of different order.<modespy.methods>
   Utility - Miscellaneous utility functions.<modespy.util>
   Tkinter Examples - GUI for showing examples of different solution methods.<modespy.tk_examples>
   Standard Problems - Collection of standard initial value problems.<modespy.std_problems>

for use under the conditions of the MIT License (see LICENSE file).
